original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = v.PostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=20 AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-20 19:02:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-03 23:36:09' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes<=2 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-11-26 03:34:11' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:00:00'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.Score >= -1 AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 20)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 19:02:22' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 23:36:09'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 2 AND users.UpVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-11-26 03:34:11'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E4.Id)
